dcterms:creator: K. S. Nayak
J. F. Nielsen
M. A. Bernstein
M. Markl
P. D. Gatehouse
R. M. Botnar
dcterms:description: 2D phase-contrast MRI (2D-PC) is used as a reference for measured flow indices, providing flow quantification from traditional phase-contrast imaging.
dcterms:title: 2D phase-contrast MRI (2D-PC)

dcterms:creator: M. A. Griswold
P. M. Jakob
R. M. Heidemann
M. Nittka
V. Jellus
J. Wang
dcterms:description: 4D-GRAPPA is a segmented 4D flow imaging prototype sequence acquired during free-breathing with respiratory navigator gating, used as a secondary reference for flow quantification.
dcterms:title: 4D-GRAPPA

dcterms:creator: A. Rich
L. C. Potter
N. Jin
Y. Liu
O. P. Simonetti
R. Ahmad
dcterms:description: ReVEAL4D is a Bayesian approach for 4D flow imaging of the aortic valve in a single breath-hold, validated in this study for accurate flow quantification.
dcterms:title: ReVEAL4D

dcterms:creator: B. Liu
Y. M. Zou
L. Ying
dcterms:description: L1-SENSE is a compressed sensing technique applied in parallel MRI, used in this study for comparison with ReVEAL4D.
dcterms:title: L1-SENSE

dcterms:creator: J. Y. Cheng
T. Zhang
M. T. Alley
M. Uecker
M. Lustig
J. M. Pauly
dcterms:description: XD-FLOW is a method for comprehensive multi-dimensional MRI for simultaneous assessment of cardiopulmonary anatomy and physiology, referenced in the context of advanced imaging techniques.
dcterms:title: XD-FLOW

dcterms:creator: M. Markl
A. Frydrychowicz
S. Kozerke
M. Hope
O. Wieben
dcterms:description: 4D flow MRI provides full volumetric and temporally resolved mapping of the three-dimensional velocity vector, used as a comprehensive imaging technique for hemodynamic assessment.
dcterms:title: 4D flow MRI

dcterms:creator: E. Bollache
A. J. Barker
R. S. Dolan
J. C. Carr
P. van Ooij
R. Ahmadian
dcterms:description: 4D flow imaging of the aorta using k-t accelerated methods, demonstrating feasibility and impact of various parameters on hemodynamic measurements.
dcterms:title: 4D flow imaging of the aorta
